ModMetaData.name: TEMPORARY 1.6 Allow Tunnelers To Drill
ModMetaData.author: Porio
ModMetaData.description:
PATCH MADE BY Enduriel https://steamcommunity.com/id/Endur1el
1.5 UPDATE BY Kazamizam https://steamcommunity.com/id/Kazamizam
THIS IS A TEMPORARY 1.6 VERSION OF Allow Tunnelers To Drill IT WILL BE REMOVED AS SOON AS THEY UPDATE THE MOD
ORIGINAL MAKER FOUND HERE https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2882915775 AND 1.5 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3232132812
This mod allow the Tunnelers mech from Biotech dlc to drill at deep drill. Is it OP... yes
This can be added and remove without breaking save
